workshop.title: Getting Started with Oracle Big Data Service
workshop.description: Use Oracle SQL to query data across your data lake.

labs.title: Backup Hadoop Data to Object Store
labs.description: Backup data that is in your cluster to Oracle Object Store.

labs.title: Lab 100:  Review Ridership
labs.description: Use Zeppelin to review ridership info in Oracle Database.  Add Big Data SQL tables that access weather data in Oracle Object Store.
